<br>

On this page, we're listing other coding-related activities at OSU that
Code Clubbers may be interested in.
[Let us know](/about.qmd#organizers) if you have a suggestion of something
to add here.

<br>

## Formal classes

- [PLNTPTH 5006: Practical Computing Skills for Omics Data](https://mcic-osu.github.io/pracs-au25/)
  (taught by Jelmer --- next up in AU25)
- [HCS 7100: Data Visualization in R](https://www.rdataviz.com/) (taught each Autumn by Jess)
- ENT 6702: Entomological Techniques and Data Analysis (taught by Kayla Perry and Sam Ward)

<br>
